Class LogRepository

      public void save(Log entity) throws ConnectionToDatabaseException
      Saves the log to the database and to the binary file Uses a lock to prevent multiple threads from writing to the binary file at the same time

    • findAll

      public HashSet<Log> findAll() throws ConnectionToDatabaseException
      Finds all logs in the database Uses a lock to prevent multiple threads from reading the binary file at the same time

      public Set<Log> readFromBinaryFile()

      Returns:
      - set of logs read from the binary file
